subject: Order #SSN1989
description_text:
Dear sir/madam,

I ordered the Simsonn pedals plus (#SSN1989).
But I want to cancel the order because of the high import costs.
It was never explained that I need to pay 85$ because of the import.
Is it still possible to cancel my order and get my money back because the order is already arrived in Germany? I payed with creditcard.
Please I would like to hear from you as soon as possible.
Thank you in advance!

Kind regards,

Stijn Bekker

Verzonden vanuit Outlook voor iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: Hi Stijn Bekker,     Sorry, the order can no longer be cancelled, European countries do product tariffs, which is supposed to be a probability event. We will cover the $30 fee for you.

Hi,

Thank you for your quick response.
If you can cover the fee that would be very kind, but the import cost will be $85.
How can we arrange this cover?
Thank you in advance!

Kind regards,

Stijn Bekker

Verzonden vanuit Outlook<http://aka.ms/weboutlook>
________________________________
Hi Stijn Bekker,  We are sorry, but we can only cover a fee of USD 30 for you. You can pay this fee first and we will refund you USD 30.

Dear Simsonn service,

Finally, after 4 weeks and a lot of hours with UPS on the phone i received my package!
I would like to discus 2 topics about the order.

  1.
Please see our earlier email conversation about the unexpected import costs. I’m happy to receive the 30 USD that you are willing to cover. The import costs were earlier $85 on the invoice but I had to pay $132 at the end. This was way more than they showed in the invoice earlier! Thank you in advance for this! (See attached picture)
  2.
Unfortunally, the order was not complete. I ordered also the VAM pro in addition, but it was not present in the package. So I would appreciatie my money back for this part ($115.90). See attached pictures about the missing VAM pro in my package and the price.

Can you please confirm the $145.90 ($115.90+$30) refund?
Please let me know if you need more information to solve these topics!

Kind regards,

Stijn Bekker

Verzonden vanuit Outlook voor iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Stijn Bekker,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused! We can resend your VAM Pro and refund you $50. Would that be acceptable?

Dear Simsonn service,

I would appreciate the $50 refund for the additional shipment costs.
I prefer to get my money back for the VAM pro, I really don’t want to have the problems with this shipment again and I am satisfied with the pedals without te VAM pro.
So please cancel that part of the order and please refund the VAM pro.
See me email earlier for the total amount.
Thank you in advance!
I really appreciate the effort of this order from your site.

Kind regards,

Stijn Bekker

Verzonden vanuit Outlook voor iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi Stijn Bekker,    Please don't worry, we will send Haptics through another logistics channel, which will not incur any tax charges. We have never had any problems when sending Haptics separately. We apologize for the omission of your product due to the negligence of our warehouse staff.

Hi Simsonn service,

I would like to cancel the VAM pro please.
Thank you in advance!

Kind regards,

Stijn Bekker

Verzonden vanuit Outlook voor iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Stijn Bekker,    Okay, we have processed two refunds for you. Please check. We apologize for the inconvenience. Have fun!

Hi Simsonn service,

No problem, your service and communication was really good. It would still recommend your product ;).
I will keep an eye on the refunds, would take a couple of days I guess.
Which bank account did you send the refund?


Verzonden vanuit Outlook voor iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
